thread.title: Say what? Dem Sen. Blumenthal beclowns himself with this question for Sessions
thread.title_full: Say what? Dem Sen. Blumenthal beclowns himself with this question for Sessions

author: Sarah D.
title: Say what? Dem Sen. Blumenthal beclowns himself with this question for Sessions
text:
Blumenthal deserved a slap for that question. But Sessions answered him anyway: Blumenthal stumbles by asking if Sessions would take an award from the KKK. 
“I wouldn’t receive it from Henry Hayes. He no longer exists." 
— Dave Weigel (@daveweigel) January 10, 2017 Sen. Sessions brings up KKK member Henry Hayes, who he prosecuted and who received the death penalty. https://t.co/TMGQYA7kYC 
— Sari Horwitz (@SariHorwitz) January 10, 2017 Blumenthal asks Sessions if he's ever gotten award from KKK. Sessions retorts he wouldn't get award from Henry Hays, KKK member put to death 
— Steven Dennis (@StevenTDennis) January 10, 2017 When the Alabama KKK leader abducted and murdered a black teenager – Jeff Sessions pushed for and got Henry Francis Hays the death penalty. 
— Stefan Molyneux (@StefanMolyneux) January 10, 2017 
Hey, here’s an exit question for Sen. Blumenthal: @woodruffbets Did Blumenthal get any awards in 'nam? 
Inquiring minds wanna know , buddy. @woodruffbets @thedailybeast The same Blumenthal that lied about being in Vietnam?
